The elemental makes two touch attacks.
Melee Weapon Attack:
 +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 10 (2d6 + 3) fire damage. If the target is a
creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of
each of its turns.

The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the
elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile
creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage and catches fire;
until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.
The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet.
For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold
damage.
